app.name: RemotePad
app.short_description: Control your computer from the Wii U!
app.long_description:
This app let you send input from the Gamepad to your computer trough the network.
To make it work you'll need to run a client on your computer which you can find at the release page: goo.gl/7cvSSf
Currently the client only runs on windows and you cannot configure input :( Also screen streaming will most likely never be done because of the brandwidth it would require (?)
